chance.description: The value to compare the randomly generated number to.
chance.markdownDescription: The value to compare the randomly generated number to.

type.description:
## Chance

---


[Meta Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_condition_types/chance)

Generates a random number between 0.0 and 1.0 and checks if it's less than a specified value.

Type ID: `origins:chance`

---

###	Examples

```json
"condition": {
	"type": "origins:chance",
	"chance": 0.5
}
```

This example will evaluate to true 50% of the time.

title: Chance (Meta Condition Type) date: 2023-11-19

Chance

Meta Condition Type

Generates a random number between 0.0 and 1.0 and checks if it's less than a specified value.

Type ID: origins:chance

Fields

Field Type Default Description
chance Float The value to compare the randomly generated number to.

Examples

"condition": {
	"type": "origins:chance",
	"chance": 0.5
}

This example will evaluate to true 50% of the time.
